Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: To be honest out of everyone here. Bristle-Chan is the one I'm most scared to talk to.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: But we've both changed a lot since we were kids. So I'm sure with my dashing looks I'll convince her to go out with me no problem!

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Then again as I start to make my way to her I realize how much my heart is racing.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I mean we didn't exactly stop talking on very good terms.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Her head slowly turns and my eyes meet with hers.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Bristle_chan crosses her arms in front of her and scoffs. What should I say?
